title: This is the one! Art Museum 1 bed 1 bath spectacular apt!
description:
2038 Spring Garden St #3 – Available now
Incredibly well proportioned 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apt with office den bids a functional living experience with a comfortable blend of modern conveniences and historic elegance. Restored vintage hardwood flooring throughout, high vaulted ceilings, and classic outlines of quality trims & moldings illustrate picturesque accents of the past, whilst ample natural light illuminates the timeless character. Both the kitchen & bathroom maintain a youthful glow outfitted in modern aesthetic, per recent renovations. High-quality finishes, new cabinets, granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas stove and microwave create a beautifully updated venue for channeling your inner chef in the kitchen. A sleek vanity, contemporary fixtures and full sized bathtub/shower are some of the modern aesthetics that create a serene atmosphere.
The bedroom, well, absolutely stunning; a faux fireplace, tons of natural light and spacious closets integrate nicely within this impeccable sanctuary. Working from home? The 4 seasons room with wrap around windows and amazing natural light that connects wonderfully off the exterior of the unit, a perfect space for an at home office.
Vibrant location just blocks from the Philadelphia Museum of Art, Whole Foods, Kelly Drive, and countless other attractions such as shopping, restaurants, bars, gyms, highways, public transit and more. Walk to Kelly drive for your daily workout, walk to center city for work, or walk to the grocery store for all your grocery needs. A great place to live!!

title: Completely Renovated Point Breeze Home Available for Rent
description:
Completely renovated Point Breeze Home Available for Rent. This corner property feels so spacious and bright with natural light abound through the 14 windows, a 18 feet wide lot, and 10 feet high ceilings. Enter the expansive open floor plan which includes a living, dining, and kitchen area. The finishes are fantastic with black metal railings, rich dark brown hardwood floors, recessing lighting, and modern trim and doors. In the kitchen you will find GE stainless steel appliances, two toned high gloss grey and white cabinets that further reflect the natural light, a quartz countertop with loads of space for prepping food and a coffee maker, etc.., a sculptural white backsplash tile, and an island with seating for three, one waterfall edge, a double sink and pendant lighting. The first floor also has a convenient half bath and coat closet as well. On the second floor, you will find the primary suite in the rear with a full bathroom, walk in closet, and it's own private deck to enjoy your coffee, enjoy a roof garden, or relax and read a book. The primary bath has a stall shower with a detachable sprayer, lovely large tile work, and double sinks. There are also two other bedrooms with good sized closets and another full bath with a tub. Walk up another flight to a pilot house and enter the large roof deck to entertain friends and family and enjoy vistas of city center. The finished basement can be used as a a game room, office, or workout space. It also has a separate storage area and the mechanical closet too. Enjoy this fantastic location near Wharton Square Park, wonderful coffee shops like Ultimo, or walk to the Sardine Bar, Philly Tacos, and Community for a bite to eat. Also, just a 20 minute walk to Rittenhouse or a quick hop on 476 for easy commuting too. Owner looking for a December 1st start date on the lease and open to a longer term lease (ie a 14 or 16 month lease.)

title: Enter This Charming 2-bed Unit and Find an Entryway Closet
description:
Welcome to 159 N 21st Street Unit 1R! Enter this charming two-bedroom unit and find an entryway closet, decorative original fireplace, and exposed brick in the kitchen and living areas. The bright bathroom off the kitchen boasts a porcelain tub and shower. The first bedroom is adjacent to the living area with the second bedroom on the lower level, making this comfortable for roommates. There is a private patio to the back of the unit and laundry in the basement of this secure, well-maintained building. Enjoy all Logan Square has to offer like museums, restaurants, Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, and an easy point from which to commute! Nearby schools include Science Leadership Academy, Russell Byers Cs, John W. Hallahan Catholic Girls' High School and Albert M Greenfield Elementary School. The City of Philadelphia has completed a real estate tax reassessment, effective January 1, 2023. If you have any questions or concerns about the impact of this reassessment on future real estate taxes, please contact the City of Philadelphia. Compass RE is not involved in the City of Philadelphia’s tax reassessment and does not have any input or control in the results.
159 N 21st St #1R

title: Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease!
description:
Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease! The first level of the home is the garage that spans the length of the home followed by the rear yard that can be used for gardening, relaxing and entertaining. Up the stairs you have the main level of the home that is completely open with massively tall ceilings and incredible natural light. The tiered level has the living and dining space on the lower level and full kitchen with eat in nook on the upper level. The kitchen has been recently remodeled with new countertops and fixtures. The top level features three bedrooms, stackable laundry closet, hall bathroom and a brand new primary bathroom. The primary bathroom is jawdropping with accented barn door, wall to wall mirrors, gorgeous tiling, waterfall shower and free standing tub. Through the primary bedroom is access to the green roof deck. The roof deck is lined with succulents to make it a true "green" roof, has panoramic views of the city, and tons of space for get togethers. Lastly, but perhaps the biggest selling point is the prime location in fishtown right off of Frankford ave and next to Palmer park. The home is just steps away from some of the best dining/restaurants in the city such as Suraya, Wm Mulherin's & sons, Pizzeria Beddia and La Colombe. This is a rare rental in a perfect location. **Owner would like to keep the back parking spot for his wood work space but could be leased for an additional $200 per month. Home can be rented furnished for an additional $200 per month.
401 Memphis St

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

title: Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista
description:
Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista in the much sought after Meredith catchment this 2 bedroom home is snuggled inside a private gated courtyard directly across from the neighborhood favorite Cianfrani Park. As you enter into the spacious living area accented by beautiful hardwood flooring and the first of two fireplaces you're enveloped with the warm feeling of love that has filled this home. Flowing off the living room of this expanded trinity, the full eat in kitchen is contemporarily designed with a subway tiled back splash, granite countertops, a brightly lit skylight shining down from the second floor, and a unique cut out above the sink allowing for the open flow feel of this wonderful living space. The second floor features the first of two bedrooms continuing with the hardwood flow throughout, your full bathroom bright with light from your second skylight, and the perfect hallway nook accented by that same skylight that shines all the way down to the kitchen. The master bedroom on the third floor features the second fireplace as well as a lighter hard wood finish that seems to draw in all of the natural light. This along with the high slanting ceiling give this room a very open airy feel making it a truly "feel good" space. Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to be a part of a community that truly cares for each other in a home that will truly care for you.

title: Great value in Fairmount! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount
description:
Great value in Fairmount!! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount acts as the idyllic foreground to 1707 Wallace St #2R. This updated 2 bed, 1.5 bath bi-level apartment sits on the top two floors of a 4-unit building. The exterior of the building features a classic red brick facade and detailed cornice trim. Inside the unit, you're greeted by a bright and open living room and dining area with soaring 9ft ceilings, tall windows, and beautiful hardwood floors. There's also a huge storage closet and a powder room. The home's kitchen is fitted with tons of cabinetry space, stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and the in-unit laundry closet. The home's second level has a spacious bedroom, with great closet space, at the front. A full bathroom and another bedroom, ideal for an office or nursery, complete this level. 1707 Wallace St's central Fairmount location is a walker's paradise, earning a WalkScore of 92. The Philadelphia Museum of Art, Kelly Drive, and The Community College of Philadelphia are all within walking distance. Nearby Fairmount Ave and North Broad Street are lined with local shops, gyms, and restaurants, including Bar Hygge, Rybread cafe, SOUTH, and Osteria. Whole Foods, Target, and Wine & Spirits are also close by. Plus, there's easy access to public transportation, I-76, Drexel University, and The University of Penn. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!
1707 Wallace St #2R

title: Beautiful one bedroom, one bath home at the Ellington!
description:
WELCOME HOME to this beautiful one bedroom, one bath home at the Ellington! The living and dining areas offer dramatic ten foot high ceilings, Brazilian cherry hardwood floors, and oversized windows that fill the home with natural light. The kitchen with breakfast bar features Poggenpohl cabinets, stainless steel appliances, Kohler fixtures, and Capao Bonito granite countertops. The bedroom features a double door closet and is set across from the spacious spa-like bathroom, which boasts White Gioia marble tile flooring, chrome fixtures, and a ceramic sink with storage vanity. Included in the rent are central air and heating, water and sewer, 24 hour concierge, private fitness center, and club room. Valet parking is available next door in a public garage. Perfectly situated in the Rittenhouse and Avenue of the Arts area, this home is steps away from fine dining, one-of-a kind shopping, world-renowned cultural destinations and exciting nightlife. title: 1Br old city loft apartment 700 sq ft
description:
This is a beautiful lofted one bedroom in the heart of Old City.  The apartment comes with hardwood floors throughout the apartment.  The apartment was just updated with a brand central heat and air unit, new triple pane windows and hardwoods on the lower level.  The apartment is 700 square feet that has a locked front entrance, an accessible elevator, and a beautiful rooftop with a great view of the city and bridges.  As you enter the apartment you will notice fireplace equipped with an electric insert, a beautiful, builtin wooden/marble top desk, and a wine rack above the desk.  The apartment is filled with hardwood floors, exposed brick walls, and tall ceilings.  There are a few steps to head up the stairs to the lofted bedroom.  The apartment also comes with an in-unit washer and dryer.  There is also additional storage in the basement.
There are plenty of cabinet and closet spaces for your needs.  The apartment is accessible to I-95,  is seconds from the Market-Frankford subway stop on 2nd street, and across the street from the buses.  You can walk anywhere for food, entertainment, history, or whatever you want within a few minutes.  The apartment faces the nightlife off second street in old city.  There are plenty of parking lots and street parking for your car.
The apartment will be available Dec 1.  Please contact for more details.  First month, last month's rent, and a security deposit will be collected upon passing a background check.

You will enjoy living in this home & will appreciate all of amenities that that neighborhood has to offer. Just moments to Meredith, venture to nearby Shots Tower coffee, Weccacoe playground, Mario Lanza park, restaurants along E Passyunk Ave & South St Super easy access to Delaware Ave, Old City, Ben Franklin Bridge & I-95.
